verses.verse: הַדָּבָ֞ר <WH1697> The word אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> that הָיָ֤ה <WH1961> came עַֽל־ <WH5921> concerning יִרְמְיָ֙הוּ֙ <WH3414> that came to Jeremiah עַל־ <WH5921> concerning כָּל־ <WH3605> all עַ֣ם <WH5971> concerning all the people יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah בַּשָּׁנָה֙ <WH8141> year הָֽרְבִעִ֔ית <WH7243> in the fourth לִיהוֹיָקִ֥ים <WH3079> of Jehoiakim בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יֹאשִׁיָּ֖הוּ <WH2977> of Josiah מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah הִ֗יא <WH1931> he הַשָּׁנָה֙ <WH8141> year הָרִ֣אשֹׁנִ֔ית <WH7224> that [was] the first לִנְבֽוּכַדְרֶאצַּ֖ר <WH5019> of Nebuchadrezzar מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> king בָּבֶֽל׃ <WH894> of Babylon

אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which דִּבֶּ֜ר <WH1696> spake יִרְמְיָ֤הוּ <WH3414> The which Jeremiah הַנָּבִיא֙ <WH5030> the prophet עַל־ <WH5921> unto כָּל־ <WH3605> all עַ֣ם <WH5971> unto all the people יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah וְאֶ֛ל <WH413> and to כָּל־ <WH3605> all יֹשְׁבֵ֥י <WH3427> and to all the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

מִן־ <WH4480> at שְׁלֹ֣שׁ <WH7969> that [is] the three עֶשְׂרֵ֣ה <WH6240> ten שָׁנָ֡ה <WH8141> year לְיֹאשִׁיָּ֣הוּ <WH2977> of Josiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son אָמוֹן֩ <WH526> of Amon מֶ֨לֶךְ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָ֜ה <WH3063> of Judah וְעַ֣ד ׀ <WH5704> against הַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> even unto this day הַזֶּ֗ה <WH2088> to this זֶ֚ה <WH2088> these שָׁלֹ֤שׁ <WH7969> three וְעֶשְׂרִים֙ <WH6242> and twentieth שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> year הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> has come דְבַר־ <WH1697> the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֵלָ֑י <WH413> to me וָאֲדַבֵּ֧ר <WH1696> hath come unto me and I have spoken אֲלֵיכֶ֛ם <WH413> to you אַשְׁכֵּ֥ים <WH7925> unto you rising early וְדַבֵּ֖ר <WH1696> and speaking וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> have not שְׁמַעְתֶּֽם׃ <WH8085> but ye have not hearkened

וְשָׁלַח֩ <WH7971> hath sent יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֲלֵיכֶ֜ם <WH413> about אֶֽת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all עֲבָדָ֧יו <WH5650> unto you all his servants הַנְּבִאִ֛ים <WH5030> the prophets הַשְׁכֵּ֥ם <WH7925> rising early וְשָׁלֹ֖חַ <WH7971> and sending וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> nor שְׁמַעְתֶּ֑ם <WH8085> [them] but ye have not hearkened וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor הִטִּיתֶ֥ם <WH5186> nor inclined אֶֽת־ <WH853> אָזְנְכֶ֖ם <WH241> your ear לִשְׁמֹֽעַ׃ <WH8085> to hear

לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> They said שֽׁוּבוּ־ <WH7725> Turn ye again נָ֞א <WH4994> now אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> now every one מִדַּרְכּ֤וֹ <WH1870> way הָֽרָעָה֙ <WH7451> from his evil וּמֵרֹ֣עַ <WH7455> and from the evil מַעַלְלֵיכֶ֔ם <WH4611> of your doings וּשְׁבוּ֙ <WH3427> and dwell עַל־ <WH5921> on הָ֣אֲדָמָ֔ה <WH127> in the land אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which נָתַ֧ן <WH5414> hath given יְהוָ֛ה <WH3069> God לָכֶ֖ם וְלַאֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶ֑ם <WH1> unto you and to your fathers לְמִן־ <WH4480> at עוֹלָ֖ם <WH5769> ever וְעַד־ <WH5704> for עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> and ever

וְאַל־ <WH408> not תֵּלְכ֗וּ <WH1980> go אַֽחֲרֵי֙ <WH310> not after אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> gods אֲחֵרִ֔ים <WH312> other לְעָבְדָ֖ם <WH5647> to serve וּלְהִשְׁתַּחֲוֹ֣ת <WH7812> them and to worship לָהֶ֑ם וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> no תַכְעִ֤יסוּ <WH3707> them and provoke me not to anger אוֹתִי֙ <WH854> with בְּמַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <WH4639> with the works יְדֵיכֶ֔ם <WH3027> of your hands וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> no אָרַ֖ע <WH7489> and I will do you no hurt לָכֶֽם׃

וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> have not שְׁמַעְתֶּ֥ם <WH8085> Yet ye have not hearkened אֵלַ֖י <WH413> to me נְאֻם־ <WH5002> unto me saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD לְמַ֧עַן <WH4616> order [הִכְעִסוּנִי כ] (הַכְעִיסֵ֛נִי <WH3707> be angry ק) בְּמַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <WH4639> with the works יְדֵיכֶ֖ם <WH3027> of your hands לְרַ֥ע <WH7451> to your own hurt לָכֶֽם׃ ס

לָכֵ֕ן <WH3651> Therefore כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> thus אָמַ֖ר <WH559> Therefore thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֑וֹת <WH6635> of hosts יַ֕עַן <WH3282> because אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after לֹֽא־ <WH3808> have not שְׁמַעְתֶּ֖ם <WH8085> Because ye have not heard אֶת־ <WH853> דְּבָרָֽי׃ <WH1697> my words

הִנְנִ֣י <WH2005> behold שֹׁלֵ֡חַ <WH7971> Behold I will send וְלָקַחְתִּי֩ <WH3947> and take אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all מִשְׁפְּח֨וֹת <WH4940> all the families צָפ֜וֹן <WH6828> of the north נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD וְאֶל־ <WH413> to נְבֽוּכַדְרֶאצַּ֣ר <WH5019> and Nebuchadrezzar מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> the king בָּבֶל֮ <WH894> of Babylon עַבְדִּי֒ <WH5650> my servant וַהֲבִ֨אֹתִ֜ים <WH935> and will bring עַל־ <WH5921> against הָאָ֤רֶץ <WH776> them against this land הַזֹּאת֙ <WH2063> likewise וְעַל־ <WH5921> and against יֹ֣שְׁבֶ֔יהָ <WH3427> and against the inhabitants וְעַ֛ל <WH5921> and against כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַגּוֹיִ֥ם <WH1471> thereof and against all these nations הָאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> these סָבִ֑יב <WH5439> round about וְהַ֣חֲרַמְתִּ֔ים <WH2763> and will utterly destroy וְשַׂמְתִּים֙ <WH7760> them and make לְשַׁמָּ֣ה <WH8047> them an astonishment וְלִשְׁרֵקָ֔ה <WH8322> and an hissing וּלְחָרְב֖וֹת <WH2723> desolations עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> and perpetual

וְהַאֲבַדְתִּ֣י <WH6> Moreover I will take מֵהֶ֗ם <WH1992> them ק֤וֹל <WH6963> from them the voice שָׂשׂוֹן֙ <WH8342> of mirth וְק֣וֹל <WH6963> and the voice שִׂמְחָ֔ה <WH8057> of gladness ק֥וֹל <WH6963> the voice חָתָ֖ן <WH2860> of the bridegroom וְק֣וֹל <WH6963> and the voice כַּלָּ֑ה <WH3618> of the bride ק֥וֹל <WH6963> the sound רֵחַ֖יִם <WH7347> of the millstones וְא֥וֹר <WH216> and the light נֵֽר׃ <WH5216> of the candle

וְהָֽיְתָה֙ <WH1961> become כָּל־ <WH3605> whole הָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> And this whole land הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> will be a לְחָרְבָּ֖ה <WH2723> shall be a desolation לְשַׁמָּ֑ה <WH8047> [and] an astonishment וְעָ֨בְד֜וּ <WH5647> shall serve הַגּוֹיִ֥ם <WH1471> and these nations הָאֵ֛לֶּה <WH428> and these אֶת־ <WH853> מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> the king בָּבֶ֖ל <WH894> of Babylon שִׁבְעִ֥ים <WH7657> seventy שָׁנָֽה׃ <WH8141> years

וְהָיָ֣ה <WH1961> become כִמְלֹ֣אות <WH4390> are accomplished שִׁבְעִ֣ים <WH7657> And it shall come to pass when seventy שָׁנָ֡ה <WH8141> years אֶפְקֹ֣ד <WH6485> [that] I will punish עַל־ <WH5921> and מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> the king בָּבֶל֩ <WH894> of Babylon וְעַל־ <WH5921> and that הַגּ֨וֹי <WH1471> and that nation הַה֧וּא <WH1931> he נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> עֲוֹנָ֖ם <WH5771> for their iniquity וְעַל־ <WH5921> and אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> and the land כַּשְׂדִּ֑ים <WH3778> of the Chaldeans וְשַׂמְתִּ֥י <WH7760> and will make אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> לְשִֽׁמְמ֥וֹת <WH8077> desolations עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> it perpetual

[וְהֵבֵאיתִי כ] (וְהֵֽבֵאתִי֙ <WH935> abide ק) עַל־ <WH5921> against הָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> upon that land הַהִ֔יא <WH1931> he אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all דְּבָרַ֖י <WH1697> all my words אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which דִּבַּ֣רְתִּי <WH1696> which I have pronounced עָלֶ֑יהָ <WH5921> against אֵ֤ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַכָּתוּב֙ <WH3789> against it [even] all that is written בַּסֵּ֣פֶר <WH5612> in this book הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which נִבָּ֥א <WH5012> hath prophesied יִרְמְיָ֖הוּ <WH3414> which Jeremiah עַל־ <WH5921> against כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַגּוֹיִֽם׃ <WH1471> against all the nations

כִּ֣י <WH3588> for עָֽבְדוּ־ <WH5647> shall serve בָ֤ם גַּם־ <WH1571> even הֵ֙מָּה֙ <WH1992> like גּוֹיִ֣ם <WH1471> nations רַבִּ֔ים <WH7227> For many וּמְלָכִ֖ים <WH4428> kings גְּדוֹלִ֑ים <WH1419> and great וְשִׁלַּמְתִּ֥י <WH7999> themselves of them also and I will recompense לָהֶ֛ם כְּפָעֳלָ֖ם <WH6467> them according to their deeds וּכְמַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <WH4639> and according to the works יְדֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH3027> of their own hands ס

כִּ֣י <WH3588> For כֹה֩ <WH3541> thus אָמַ֨ר <WH559> For thus saith יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֤י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel אֵלַ֔י <WH413> to me קַ֠ח <WH3947> unto me Take אֶת־ <WH853> כּ֨וֹס <WH3563> cup הַיַּ֧יִן <WH3196> the wine הַחֵמָ֛ה <WH2534> of this fury הַזֹּ֖את <WH2063> from מִיָּדִ֑י <WH3027> at my hand וְהִשְׁקִיתָ֤ה <WH8248> thee to drink אֹתוֹ֙ <WH853> אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> and cause all the nations אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> to whom אָנֹכִ֛י <WH595> I שֹׁלֵ֥חַ <WH7971> to whom I send אוֹתְךָ֖ <WH853> אֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH413> about

וְשָׁת֕וּ <WH8354> And they shall drink וְהִֽתְגֹּֽעֲשׁ֖וּ <WH1607> and be moved וְהִתְהֹלָ֑לוּ <WH1984> and be mad מִפְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> because הַחֶ֔רֶב <WH2719> of the sword אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> that אָנֹכִ֥י <WH595> I שֹׁלֵ֖חַ <WH7971> that I will send בֵּינֹתָֽם׃ <WH996> among

וָאֶקַּ֥ח <WH3947> Then took אֶת־ <WH853> הַכּ֖וֹס <WH3563> I the cup מִיַּ֣ד <WH3027> hand יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> at the LORD'S וָֽאַשְׁקֶה֙ <WH8248> to drink אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> and made all the nations אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> to whom שְׁלָחַ֥נִי <WH7971> had sent יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> unto whom the LORD אֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH413> about

אֶת־ <WH853> יְרוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <WH3389> [To wit] Jerusalem וְאֶת־ <WH853> עָרֵ֣י <WH5892> and the cities יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah וְאֶת־ <WH853> מְלָכֶ֖יהָ <WH4428> and the kings אֶת־ <WH853> שָׂרֶ֑יהָ <WH8269> thereof and the princes לָתֵ֨ת <WH5414> thereof to make אֹתָ֜ם <WH853> לְחָרְבָּ֧ה <WH2723> them a desolation לְשַׁמָּ֛ה <WH8047> an astonishment לִשְׁרֵקָ֥ה <WH8322> an hissing וְלִקְלָלָ֖ה <WH7045> and a curse כַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> as [it is] this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> is this

אֶת־ <WH853> פַּרְעֹ֧ה <WH6547> Pharaoh מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king מִצְרַ֛יִם <WH4714> of Egypt וְאֶת־ <WH853> עֲבָדָ֥יו <WH5650> and his servants וְאֶת־ <WH853> שָׂרָ֖יו <WH8269> and his princes וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all עַמּֽוֹ׃ <WH5971> and all his people

וְאֵת֙ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all הָעֶ֔רֶב <WH6154> the foreign וְאֵ֕ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all מַלְכֵ֖י <WH4428> people and all the kings אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> of the land הָע֑וּץ <WH5780> of Uz וְאֵ֗ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all מַלְכֵי֙ <WH4428> and all the kings אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> of the land פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> of the Philistines וְאֶת־ <WH853> אַשְׁקְל֤וֹן <WH831> and Ashkelon וְאֶת־ <WH853> עַזָּה֙ <WH5804> and Azzah וְאֶת־ <WH853> עֶקְר֔וֹן <WH6138> and Ekron וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> שְׁאֵרִ֥ית <WH7611> and the remnant אַשְׁדּֽוֹד׃ <WH795> of Ashdod
אֶת־ <WH853> אֱד֥וֹם <WH123> Edom וְאֶת־ <WH853> מוֹאָ֖ב <WH4124> and Moab וְאֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> and the children עַמּֽוֹן׃ <WH5983> of Ammon

וְאֵת֙ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all מַלְכֵי־ <WH4428> And all the kings צֹ֔ר <WH6865> of Tyrus וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all מַלְכֵ֣י <WH4428> and all the kings צִיד֑וֹן <WH6721> of Zidon וְאֵת֙ <WH853> מַלְכֵ֣י <WH4428> and the kings הָאִ֔י <WH339> of the isles אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which בְּעֵ֥בֶר <WH5676> which [are] beyond הַיָּֽם׃ <WH3220> the sea

וְאֶת־ <WH853> דְּדָ֤ן <WH1719> Dedan וְאֶת־ <WH853> תֵּימָא֙ <WH8485> and Tema וְאֶת־ <WH853> בּ֔וּז <WH938> and Buz וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all קְצוּצֵ֥י <WH7112> and all [that are] in the utmost פֵאָֽה׃ <WH6285> corners
